content.title: Main Switches
content.fullText: The supply to an extra-low voltage electrical installation shall be controlled by a main switch or switches operating in all unearthed conductors. Exception: This requirement need not apply where the extra-low voltage electrical installation is supplied from part of an electrical installation operating at a voltage greater than extra-low voltage and the operation of the main switch for the high voltage part of the electrical installation results in the disconnection of the supply.
